desc: Order our hand poured scented candles today. Allow us to be the last soy candle you ever need to smell. Shop our selection of Essential Oil scented soy candles, as well as pthalate free fragrance oil soy candles. We offer custom orders and wholesale for all your business needs!

layout.text: OUR CANDLE SCENTS STAY ON YOUR MIND LONG AFTER THE CANDLE IS GONE. ORDER TODAY AND SMELL FOR YOURSELF.
